I also started learning about the zkSync Hardhat plugin, which helps you deploy smart contracts directly to zkSync.

I used my MetaMask wallet to bridge assets from Ethereum Sepolia Testnet to zkSync Sepolia.
A bridge is a tool that lets you move tokens or data from one blockchain network to another. Think of it like a digital â€œroadâ€ connecting two different chains. ğŸŒ‰
zkSync is a Layer 2 rollup built to scale Ethereum with faster and cheaper transactions. ğŸš€

Day 11 of My Blockchain Journey
